Allentown.Lehigh Parkway:
Lehigh Parkway is a large public park along the Little Lehigh River in the city of Allentown, Pennsylvania, in the United States.

It is the most prominent park of the city and follows the Little Lehigh Creek for three miles from the center of the city to Cedar Crest Boulevard.
The park features many scenic exercising trails in addition to bridle paths, a shooting range, and many fishing locations.
